quest.name: Primal Fear
journal: Urianger looks beseechingly in your direction, fear in his eyes.
Rumors of a primal sighting in the Shroud have Urianger gravely concerned, and he would have you ascertain its identity. First, you are to seek the counsel of Bowlord Lewin.
Bowlord Lewin bids you welcome and expresses his gratitude for your aid in the investigation of the primal.
objectives: Speak with Lewin at the Seat of the First Bow.

dialogue.name: URIANGER
dialogue.text: Friend to the dawn, hear my plea. Tidings most ominous arrive from Gridania─a primal walketh the Shroud.

dialogue.name: URIANGER
dialogue.text: Those who have borne the eldritch spirit witness─and returned to tell the tale─avow that ne'er before have they seen its like.

dialogue.name: URIANGER
dialogue.text: The Gods' Quiver doth investigate as we speak, and meseems Bowlord Lewin would welcome a capable adventurer's helping hand. Pray hie thee to the Seat of the First Bow and shine thy light upon the matter.

dialogue.name: LEWIN
dialogue.text: Surname. I have heard much of your deeds in recent days.

dialogue.name: LEWIN
dialogue.text: You come to lend your strength to the primal investigation, yes? Your aid is most welcome.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Proceed to the Seat of the First Bow?

obj.n: Who Was That Man in Black
